name: Like A Puppy: EDM Music Game
name_original: Like A Puppy: EDM Music Game
description:
Like A Puppy: EDM Music Game Simple. Fun. Cute And Clean.

Like A Puppy: EDM Music Game is a casual game with a very small and fresh style of music breakthrough. Players control a cute puppy to move around in the game and collect all kinds of long necks that fall on it. Relaxed and happy music, simple and interesting operations, a comfortable game experience, and brings players a sense of healing. Let's start the adventure together Right! We need to enter all kinds of peculiar levels to experience. There are super small fresh pictures and healing music, which can relax our body and mind when we are adventurous in the game.

Game features:
Relax your mood, the cute puppy image, let it sway happily to the music beat; all kinds of interesting growth methods, happy growth and joy, capture various feeds, and experience more fun; pets are small at first, The game process can be recorded and photographed at any time, with various story contents. It is such a loving game, you will love it.

Gameplay:
The cute game style, the freedom of gameplay, and the cartoon gameplay make people immersed in it and grow up happily. The cute style, the fresh picture, the puppy's shape design is very cute, open together.
